text: Van Johnson (Charles Van Dell Johnson, August 25, 1916 - December 12, 2008) was an American movie, television, stage, radio, voice actor, singer, and dancer who is known for his roles in 30 Seconds over Tokyo, A Guy Named Joe and in The Caine Mutiny. Johnson was born on August 25, 1916 in Newport, Rhode Island."Van Johnson Biography." Turner Classic Movies. Retrieved: October 28, 2011. He was married to Eve Lynn Abbott Wynn from 1947 until they divorced in 1968. He has 1 child with Wynn and two step-children. Johnson died on December 12, 2008 from natural causes in his Nyack, New York home, aged 92.Aljean, Harmetz. "Van Johnson, Film Actor, Is Dead at 92." The New York Times, August 12, 2008. title: Van Johnson
